name: Timed Life
description:
Fight for time to survive as increasing waves of enemies pursue you.

This game was made for the One Game a Month Jam using the Godot game engine.

Theme: TIME IS KEY

Controls:
Shoot: Left Mouse Button (Hold to auto-fire)
Dash: Right Mouse Button
Movement: WASD

Attributions/Credits:

Programming/Design:
GetCreative

Art:
Tileset: https://raou.itch.io/
Enemy Sprites: https://penusbmic.itch.io/

SFX:
Gun + Hit Marker SFX from https://shapeforms.itch.io
Additional SFX by Anton

Music:
Main Menu: Royalty free music from https://www.productioncrate.com
Combat: Royalty free music from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Font:
https://kenney.nl/
